Document
_{Dyslexic Style (for the Pathfinder theme)}
units.stylesheet:
/* theme/adventurer/dyslexic */
@font-face { font-family: "Merriweather Sans"; font-weight: bold; src: url('data:application/x-font-woff;charset=utf-8;base64,'); }

html .page h2, html .page h3, html .page h5, html .page legend, html .page span.span--article-cat, html .page article header .annotation, html .page .field u, html .page .level-marker__level, html .page .page__watermark__inner { text-transform: none; font-family: "Merriweather Sans", "Helvetica", Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; }

html .page h3 { font-size: 1rem; }

html .page h3:first-letter { font-size: 1rem; }
